name: @omd01/aws-ses-mcp
description: Send emails directly from your applications using AWS SES. Integrate seamlessly with Cursor or Claude Desktop to compose and dispatch emails without manual copy-pasting. Enjoy features like CC, BCC, and customizable sender addresses for enhanced email management.

tools.name: send-email
tools.description: Send an email using AWS SES

cc.description: Optional array of CC email addresses. You MUST ask the user for this parameter. Under no circumstance provide it yourself

bcc.description: Optional array of BCC email addresses. You MUST ask the user for this parameter. Under no circumstance provide it yourself

html.description: HTML email content. When provided, the plain text argument MUST be provided as well.
